text: Baravuze bamwe ataco bazi bati:- mbega ni kuki Imana itavugana natwe canke ikadushikiriza ivyemezo, kandi uko nyene niko bavuze bamwe bari imbere yabo kukarorero kiyo mvugo yabo hamwe n’imitima yabo igomba gusa n’iyindi, mu vy’ukuri twebwe turamaze kwerekana ivyemezo vyacu kubantu bemeza ibintu n’ibindi
